name: 進階筆譯（英譯中）
description: This research seminar aims to help students to improve their translation skills and increase their sensitivity to different styles and tones of writing. Students will have to submit all the assignments on time and participate in class discussion.
goals: to analyze the structure and discourse conventions of numerous written products
increase their sensitivity to different styles and tones of writing
